[[File:FIgure D.jpg|vignette|Squamous cell carcinoma: irregular ulcerative-vegetative tumour, covered with crusts, with inflammatory margins and indurated base. ]]

question.title: What is a characteristic of squamous cell carcinoma?

option_a.title: It is typically a benign tumor
option_a.description: A common misconception about skin cancer

option_b.title: It is often associated with human papillomavirus (HPV)
option_b.description: A common risk factor for certain types of skin cancer

option_c.title: It is usually a slow-growing tumor
option_c.description: A characteristic of some skin cancers, but not all

option_d.title: It is typically a malignant tumor
option_d.description: A correct description of squamous cell carcinoma
